182177.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>You can only smile like that until
today.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182177.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「そないに　笑ってられるんは　今日までや。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182178.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「ヨ……ヨイちゃん！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182179.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>I was so surprised because it was so
sudden! Did you come to visit me?<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182179.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「急だったから　びっくりしちゃった！
　もしかして　遊びにきてくれたの……？<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182180.en: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>We will not stay long.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182180.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「……長居は　いたしまへん。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182181.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>I'm here today to extend an invitation
to everyone in the Yang Clan.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182181.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「今日は　陽衆の皆さんに 
　招待状を　渡しにまいりましたんえ。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182182.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>Soon we will be reenacting the Heaven
and Earth ceremony.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182182.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「間もなく……天地の儀を　再演します。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182183.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「えっ……？　どうして？<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182184.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Because of the Heaven and Earth
ceremony, Yoi's father<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182184.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「天地の儀のせいで　ヨイちゃんの
　お父さんは……。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182185.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>I'll say this now.I hate your good guy
side.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182185.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「この際やし　言うとくわ。 
　ウチは　あんたの善人面が　大っ嫌いやねん。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182186.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>Growing up in the light, not a single
stagnant moment! I can't see a single
stutter.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182186.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「光の中で　すくすく　育って
　いっぺんの　よどみも　あらしまへん！
　って　顔やわ。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182187.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>That's not true! There are lots of
things I don't like about myself, too.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182187.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「そんなこと……ないよ！
　あたしにも　嫌なとこ　いっぱいあるよ。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182188.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>That's right. You look as if you've
forgotten your own mistakes.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182188.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「せやな。自分のあやまちを
　忘れたような　顔しとるとことか。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182189.en: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>You killed him.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182189.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「……あんたが　殺したんや。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182190.en:
The ceremony will take place in the west of the Sunset Meadow, where the yin and yang chi merge. Nikoroi will
be there to witness the ceremony.
182190.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「儀式の場所は　陰陽の気が混じりあう
　落陽の草原の西。見届け役として
　ニコロイ様にも　お越しいただきます。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182191.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>This is a festival for the Yinshu. The
hands of the Yinshu are in charge of
everything.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182191.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「これは　陰衆のための祭り。
　陰衆の手で　すべてを　取り仕切ります。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182192.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>In other words, the Yinzhuang have
replaced the Yang Clan in the public
eye.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182192.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「つまり　陰衆が　陽衆にとってかわり 
　表舞台に　姿を現すってことどす。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182193.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>You guys should just burn it in your
eyes as best you can.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182193.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「あんたらは　せいぜい 
　目に焼きつけはれば　よろしおす。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182194.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>The time when Yang Clan will be in the
shadows.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182194.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「……陽衆が陰にのまれる　その時を。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182195.en: <start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>Yoi? Yoi is here?<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182195.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「ヨイ……？
　ヨイが　来ておるのか……？<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182196.en: Yoi, be a druid over Yi.
182196.ja:
<center>ヨイ……。
ワイを超える　天地雷鳴士になりや。

182197.en:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Here I come, druid. This is where you
will perform the rites of heaven and
earth.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182197.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>「来たぞ　天地雷鳴士よ……。
　この場所で　天地の儀を　おこなうのだな。<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182198.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>druid Ouma, the former leader of the
Yinshu, is the daughter of Yoi.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182198.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「天地雷鳴士　陰衆の前頭領
　オウマが娘……ヨイにございます。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182199.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>I would like to thank you, Your
Majesty, for your visit to such a
grassy place.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182199.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「かような草深い地に　ご足労いただいて 
　国王様には　御礼もうしあげます。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182200.en:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Lift up your face.I was very sorry to
hear about your father.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182200.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>「……おもてを　上げよ。 
　そなたの父のこと　まことに残念であった。<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182201.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>It is my father's long-cherished wish
that the Yinshu be restored. Today, I
would like to fulfill that wish.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182201.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「陰衆の復権は　父の悲願。
　その想いを　今日　かなえとうございます。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182202.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>I hope that you will succeed in the
rites of heaven and earth, and become
a member of the royal family.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182202.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「天地の儀に　成功した　あかつきには…… 
　どうか　陰衆を　王家のおかかえに。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182203.en:
Hmm. The Heaven and Earth Ceremony is an important ritual that invites Tenotsu Kijin, the Great Genshin, to
bring heaven and earth into balance.
182203.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>「……ふむ。
　天地の儀は　大幻魔テンオツキジンを　招いて
　天地万物の気を　ととのえる　大切な祭祀。<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182204.en:
If you can pull off this ritual with flying colors and bring a boon to Kamiharmui, I will consider that as
well.
182204.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>「そなたが　この儀式を　見事にこなし 
　カミハルムイに　恩恵をもたらすのならば……
　そのことも　考えておこう。<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182205.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Yoi, it's too dangerous.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182205.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「ヨイちゃん……危険すぎるよ……。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182206.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>We will now begin the ceremony of
heaven and earth.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182206.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「これより……天地の儀を　始めますえ。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182207.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「テンショウジョウ　チショウジョウ……<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182208.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>Nige shoujou rokkonshoujout
haraitamau.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182208.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「ナイゲショウジョウ　ロッコンショウジョウト
　ハライタマウ……。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182209.en: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>Hear me, Tenotsu Kizin!<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182209.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「聞こしめせ　テンオツキジン！！<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182210.ja: <start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001><center>アァアアァアアア……。<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182211.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>I did it! We brought down the Great
Demon!<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182211.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「やった……！
　ウチが　大幻魔を　降ろしたんや！<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182212.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「ヨイちゃん　ちがうっ……！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182213.en: <start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>What is this?<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182213.ja: <start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>「こっ　これは……！？<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182214.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>This feeling is the same as that
time.It's Tenotsu Kijin, who became a
raging evil spirit.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182214.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「この感じ……あの時と同じ。 
　荒ぶる悪霊になった　テンオツキジンだよ……。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182215.en: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>That's not true!<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182215.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「そないなわけ　あらへん！<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182216.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>Because the reason you failed at that
time was because you were biting your
spell!<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182216.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「だって……あん時　失敗したんは 
　あんたが　呪文をかんだからやん！<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182217.en:
<start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001>O foolish lass. I was then and I am
now the same.<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182217.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001><center>……愚かな小娘よ。
往きし時も　今も……変わらぬ。<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182218.en: <start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001>You're the one who apologized.<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182218.ja: <start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001><center>あやまったのは　貴様ぞ。<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182220.en:
<start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001>There was a dark shadow in your heart,
a strong desire to be recognized above
the Yang Clan.<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182220.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001><center>貴様の心には　濃き陰があった。
陽衆より　認められたい……という強い欲。<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182221.en:
<start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001>The yin and yang of heaven and earth
must intermingle equally in order for
this to be true.<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182221.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001><center>天地の儀は　陰と陽が　等しく
交じりあわねば　成り立たぬのだ……。<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182222.en: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>if you say so<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182222.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「ほ……ほんなら……<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182223.en: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>I killed your father.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182223.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「父上を……殺したんは…………。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182224.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Yoi! Don't take on any more shade.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182224.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「ヨイちゃん！！
　それ以上　陰を背負っちゃだめだよ。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182225.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Sadness and hatred increase the
negative chi. Don't suffer anymore!<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182225.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「悲しみや憎しみは　陰の気を増やしちゃう。
　もう　苦しまないで！！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182226.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Light creates shadows. We are supposed
to be one.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182226.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「光があるから　影ができる……。
　あたしたち　ふたりで　ひとつのはずなのに。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182227.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Why can't we understand each other?<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182227.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「どうして　わかりあえないんだろう……。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182228.en:
Because we didn't try to understand each other.I could have told about my pain and
suffering.
182228.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「……わかりあおうと　しなかったからだよね。 
　<pc>には　つらいことや
　苦しいこと　ちゃんと　話せたのに。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182229.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Hey Yoi! I want to unite the Yang Clan
and the Yin crowd!<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182229.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「ねえ　ヨイちゃん！
　あたしは　陽衆と陰衆を　ひとつにしたい！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182230.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>So I will carry the shadow born of
your suffering with me!<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182230.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「だから　あなたの苦しみから生まれた
　陰を　一緒に　背負うよ！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182231.en:
<start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001>I am not in your hands. I am the god
who controls the troubles that arise
in the world.<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182231.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001><center>貴様らの手には　負えん……。
我は　世に生じた　厄を統べる神なのだから。<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182232.en:
<start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001>No matter how many times I come back,
it's the same thing.<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182232.ja: <start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001><center>幾度　来ようとも　同じことだ。<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182233.en:
<start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001>I am not in your hands. I am the god
who controls the troubles that arise
in the world.<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182233.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50751 _normal m00001><center>貴様らの手には　負えん……。
我は　世に生じた　厄を統べる神なのだから。<stop_lip_animation m50751 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182234.en:
The power of yin and yang intermingle
and become one.
182234.ja:
<center>陰と陽のチカラが　よどみなく　交わり
ひとつに　なっている……。

182235.ja: <center>そなたたち……陰を受け入れたのだな。

182236.en:
The light becomes stronger because you
know your shadow.
182236.ja:
<center>おのれの陰を　知るからこそ……
光は　より　強くなる……。

182237.en:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>One who has both yin and yang in equal
measure. That's what you call a druid.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182237.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>「陰と陽　ふたつを　等しく備えた者……。
　それを　天地雷鳴士と　呼ぶのだな。<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182238.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「ヨイちゃん……！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182239.en: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>Asahi is for you.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182239.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「アサヒ……ウチは……
　あんたに…………。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182241.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Let's talk more. We can share our
sorrows and sufferings.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182241.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「あたしたち……もっと　お話ししよ。
　悲しみも苦しみも　分けあえるよ……。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182242.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>I apologize for involving His Majesty
the King in the druid's quarrels.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182242.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「このたびは　天地雷鳴士のいさかいに
　国王様を　巻き込み　申し訳ございません。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182243.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>It seems that we have made a wrong
turn. Please remove the Yang Clan from
the royal family.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182243.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「我らは　進むべき道を　あやまったようです。
　どうか……陽衆を
　王家のおかかえから　お外しください。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182244.en:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>I can't blame you for saying so,
considering your recent fiasco.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182244.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>「……このたびの　失態を思えば 
　そなたが　そう言いだすのも
　やむをえぬことだ。<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182245.en:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>But the Kamiharmui royal family has
been supported by the druid for a
thousand years.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182245.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>「だが　カミハルムイ王家は　千年もの昔から
　天地雷鳴士に　支えられてきた。<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182246.en:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>When you become one, I will ask for
your help again.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182246.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>「……そなたらが　ひとつになりし時
　ふたたび　チカラを借りることとしよう。<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182247.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>I'm so glad you enjoyed it! Thank you!<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182247.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「…………！！
　ありがとうございます！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182248.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Good for you, Yoi!<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182248.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「よかったね　ヨイちゃん！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182249.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「ヨイ……ちゃん？<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182250.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>You still don't understand each other.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182250.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「まだ……わかりあえないんだね。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182251.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Let's go back to Yang Clan Hideout
today.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182251.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「今日は……陽衆の隠れ家に　帰ろっか。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182252.en: <start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>YoiAsahi: Well Ouma I am<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182252.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「ヨイ……アサヒ……。 
　そうか……オウマ　わしは……わしは……<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182253.en: <start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>I had to talk.<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182253.ja: <start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「わしは　話さねばならんかった……。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182254.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「お父ちゃん……？<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182255.en:
When I was a child, Yoi's father Ouma and I were friends who shared a playground in the mountains without
knowing each other's true identity.
182255.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「わしと　ヨイの父……オウマは 
　幼きおり　たがいの素性も知らぬままに
　野山で　遊び場を同じくする　友であった。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182256.en:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>Ouma would return to the Dream Forest
at night. I wondered about this as a
child.<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182256.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「オウマは　夜になると夢幻の森へ帰っていった。
　それを　子供心に　不思議に思ったものだ。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182257.en:
After growing up, I learned that my friend was the chieftain of a druid offshoot, the Yinshun, who had been
bullied by the Yang Clan.
182257.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「やがて　成長した後　我が友こそが…… 
　陽衆に　しいたげられてきた　天地雷鳴士の分派
　陰衆の頭領筋であると　知った。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182258.en: <start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>I felt pity for my friend.<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182258.ja: <start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「……わしは　我が友に　哀れみを覚えた。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182259.en:
It may have been a conceited idea, but I vowed to my friend that one day, the Yang Clan and the Yinshu would join
hands.
182259.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「それは　おごった考えだったかもしれぬが
　わしは友に　いつか　陽衆と陰衆
　両家が　手を取り合う時代を作ろうと　誓った。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182260.en:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>And finally, the day of that heaven
and earth ceremony arrived.<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182260.ja: <start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「そして　ついに　あの天地の儀の日が来た。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182261.en:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>During the ritual, I noticed that the
yin in Yoi was eating away at the yang
chi.<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182261.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「儀式の中で　わしは　ヨイの内の陰が 
　陽の気を食らっていくのに　気づいた。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182262.en:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>Ouma was fainting, defending Asahi
from the evil spirits. Seeing Yoi
clinging to his father's corpse, I<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182262.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「オウマは　悪霊から　アサヒをかばい
　こときれておった……。
　父のなきがらにすがる　ヨイを見て　わしは……<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182263.en: <start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>I could not tell the truth.<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182263.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「……わしは　真実を伝えることが
　できんかった。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182264.en:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>I could not tell the child, the
memento of a tortured friend, that it
was you who killed his father.<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182264.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「しいたげられつづけた友の　忘れ形見の幼子に 
　父を殺したのは……お前であるなどと
　わしは　伝えられんかった……。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182265.en:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>And instead, it was my daughter,
Asahi, who took the blame.<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182265.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「そして　代わりに　その責を負ったのは
　我が娘……アサヒだった。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182266.en:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>Asahi was blamed for Ouma's death, and
he was resented by Yoi and the
underworld.<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182266.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「アサヒは　オウマの死の　元凶とされ
　ヨイや　陰衆の者たちから　恨みを買った。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182267.en:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>I knew of my daughter's suffering, but
I could not say anything.<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182267.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「わしは　娘の苦しみを　知りながらも
　何も　言えんかった……。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182268.en:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>It's not as the head of the Yang Clan
or as his father.<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182268.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「それは　陽衆の頭としてでも
　父親としてでもない……<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182269.en:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>It was the atonement of a foolish man,
obsessed with guilt over his only
friend.<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182269.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「ただひとりの友への　罪悪感にとらわれた
　愚かな男の　罪滅ぼしだった。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182270.en: <start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>Asahi sorry sorry sorry.<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182270.ja: <start_lip_sync n05100 _normal m00001>「アサヒ　すまない……すまない……。<stop_lip_animation n05100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182271.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「お父ちゃん……ありがとう。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182272.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Yoi at that time would have broken
down if she heard the truth.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182272.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「あの時の　ヨイちゃんは……
　真実を聞いたら　きっと壊れちゃってた。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182273.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>My father protected my precious
friend.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182273.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「お父ちゃんは　あたしの大切な友達を
　守ってくれたんだ……。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182274.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>For Yoi-chan's sake, I don't mind
being called names.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182274.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「ヨイちゃんのためなら　あたしは
　悪く言われるくらい　へっちゃらだもの。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182275.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「それにね……<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182276.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>I was saved because someone with both
yin and yang was by my side.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
182276.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「陰と陽をそなえた人が　そばに　いてくれたから
　あたしは　いつのまにか　救われてたんだ。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

182277.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「…………ありがとね　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
